creator: Ivant Technologies and Business Solutions Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Use the OrderReady mobile app to notify and alert your customers once their Orders are ready. Improve your customer service and project a professional image. No need to shout out the order numbers, it's much better than using electronic pagers or buzzer devices.

Currently with 600,000+ Orders served and counting!

Project a professional image and at the same time provide better service to your customers.

Simple 1-minute setup for the Customer Order Alert Screen (requires a WIFI internet connection):
1. Download the OrderReady mobile app.
2. Connect Smart TV or PC Monitor web browser to the Internet.
3. Input the Display Code to connect the mobile app to the smart TV unit.
4. Start your OrderReady alert TV Screen Display immediately!

Improve your operations for cafes, restaurants, bakeries, repair shops and various other businesses.

Efficient: no need to shout the order numbers, or customers repeatedly asking if their orders are done.
Professional: use technology to to enhance image for your business
Service: improve customers service with timely notifications

Basic system requirements:
- Android mobile phone or Android tablet
- Smart TV preferably Samsung / LG brands
- WIFI with stable internet connection at least 10 MBPS

In-App Subscription for OrderReady Alert Screen TV:
- Upon purchase provides unlimited number of Order Numbers per day!
- A 7 days FREE trial period is provided
- After the expiration of the 7 days FREE trail period, you will be charged the regular monthly recurring subscription rate of US $19.99
- You will be charged in your local currency. Payment will be charged to your Google Android Account at confirmation of purchase
- Monthly subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged US$ 19.99 for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases the OrderReady in-app monthly subscription
- Subscriptions may be managed by the User and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the User's Account Settings after purchase

Privacy Policy: https://www.orderready.app/privacypolicy.do

Terms & Conditions: https://www.orderready.app/termsandcondition.do

Support URL: https://www.orderready.app/home.do#contact

Currently with 1 million+ Orders served and counting!

Project a professional image and at the same time provide better service to your customers.

Simple 5-minutes setup for the Customer Order Alert Screen (requires a WIFI internet connection):
1. Download the OrderReady mobile app.
2. Connect a smart TV or a PC monitor web browser to the Internet.
3. Input the Display Code to connect the mobile app to the smart TV unit.
4. Start your OrderReady alert TV Screen Display immediately!

Improve your operations for cafes, restaurants, fast foods, bakeries, repair shops and various other businesses.

Efficient: no need to shout the order numbers, or customers repeatedly asking if their orders are done.
Professional: use technology to improve operations for your business
Service: improve customers service with timely notifications

Basic system requirements:
- Android mobile phone or Android tablet
- Smart TV preferably Samsung / LG brands
- WIFI with stable internet connection at least 10 MBPS

In-App Subscription for OrderReady Alert Screen TV:
- Upon purchase provides unlimited number of Order Numbers per day!
- A 7 days FREE trial period is provided
- After the expiration of the 7 days FREE trial period, you will be charged the regular monthly recurring subscription rate.
- OrderReady Lite for US$ 9.95 per month, limited to a maximum of 25 Order Numbers per day.
- OrderReady Advanced for US$ 19.95 per month, unlimited number of Order Numbers per day.
- You will be charged in your local currency. Payment will be charged to your Google Android Account at confirmation of purchase
- Monthly subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Subscriptions may be managed by the User and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the User's Account Settings after purchase

Privacy Policy: https://www.orderready.app/privacypolicy.do

Terms & Conditions: https://www.orderready.app/termsandcondition.do

Support URL: https://www.orderready.app/home.do#contact

Currently with 5 million+ Orders served and counting! This is not a screen mirroring app, you are free to use your mobile device while the TV Screen shows the Order Numbers.

Project a professional image and at the same time provide better service to your customers.

Simple 5-minutes setup for the Customer Order Alert Screen (requires a WIFI internet connection):
1. Download the OrderReady mobile app.
2. Connect a smart TV or a PC monitor web browser to the Internet.
3. Input the Display Code to connect the mobile app to the smart TV unit.
4. Start your OrderReady alert TV Screen Display immediately!

Improve your operations for cafes, restaurants, fast foods, bakeries, repair shops and various other businesses.

Efficient: no need to shout the order numbers, or customers repeatedly asking if their orders are done.
Professional: use technology to improve operations for your business
Service: improve customers service with timely notifications

Basic system requirements:
- Android mobile phone or Android tablet
- Smart TV preferably Samsung / LG brands
- WIFI with stable internet connection at least 10 MBPS

In-App Subscription for OrderReady Alert Screen TV:
- Upon purchase provides unlimited number of Order Numbers per day!
- OrderReady Lite for US$ 9.95 per month, limited to a maximum of 25 Order Numbers per day.
- OrderReady Advanced for US$ 19.95 per month, unlimited number of Order Numbers per day.
- You will be charged in your local currency. Payment will be charged to your Google Android Account at confirmation of purchase
- Monthly subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Subscriptions may be managed by the User and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the User's Account Settings after purchase
